channel.title: Runescape is down
channel.description:
Ok so I just read this on a website (Not Runescape).
"We have found that the root of the problem is a dedicated denial of service attack originating from a VPN. We are trying to find out who owns this and get it taken off the web. Please bare with us - Mod Knox"
Does look pretty fake but if it is real Kudos to the people doing it.
Can anybody access forums too see if this is real because its down for me?

item.title: Runescape is down
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:390517”][quote author=flj0yter0p link=topic=486428.msg3564673#msg3564673 date=1302553877]

[quote]Some profile data may have been lost during this time.
At the moment we are not planning a roll back. [/quote]
Profile data?

Worked my ass off today smithing…
[/quote]
He’s full of shit, look at the twitter, they saved everyone.[/quote]I’m in now and so do a lot of people.

Read full topic
